titleStmt.title: An excellent treatise touching the restoring againe of him that is fallen written by the woorthy man Saint Iohn Chrysostome ... ; turned and put into English, out of an ancient Latine translation, written in velume, by R.W. ...
titleStmt.author: John Chrysostom, Saint, d. 407.
Wolcomb, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ar. Hatfield for Io. Winnington at the Golden Tunne, neere to S. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
